name: Medjed's Arena of Madness
description:
You are Medjed, little is known about you but that doesn't matter. Why is that? BECAUSE YOU CAN SHOOT LASERS FROM YOUR EYES! Defeat everyone in your way and claim  the highest possible score! Get recognized!

This game was created during #PaintGameJam (2017).

Credits:

Music: "Suez Crisis" by Spring (https://opengameart.org/users/spring)
